description: This Java source file defines a Spring Boot REST controller named HelloController. It provides several public endpoints for the Learning App, including a welcome message, redirect to Swagger UI, health check, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller exposing public API endpoints for the Learning App, including health checks, welcome message, documentation redirect, and app info.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a simple greeting message to verify API is reachable.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects the user to the Swagger UI documentation page, preserving the original request's scheme, host, and port to handle proxies.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Provides a health status indicator for the application, returning 'OK'.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Returns basic information about the application.
